entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then clearing. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 30 January 2023
